meanings.definition: Make (someone) familiar with or used to something.
meanings.sent1: She familiarized her new friend with the school layout.
meanings.sent2: He familiarized himself with the rules before starting the game.
meanings.sent3: The cat familiarized itself with the house by exploring every corner.
meanings.sent4: The book familiarized me with the history of ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent5: The training program familiarized the employees with the new software efficiently.

meanings.definition: Acquaint or familiarize oneself with something.
meanings.sent1: I familiarized myself with the local customs before traveling.
meanings.sent2: She familiarized herself with the menu before ordering.
meanings.sent3: The robot familiarized itself with the environment by scanning the room.
meanings.sent4: The detective familiarized himself with the case details to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent5: The student familiarized herself with the subject by reading extra books.
